name: Unzip
author: thorli
requirements: This script requires Python 3.8.0+ to be installed on your system.
description: This script extracts nested zip archives from downloaded files.

options.name: UnzipCmd
description: If blank, NZBGet "UnzipCmd" setting is used.

options.name: WaitTime
description: Time (in seconds) to pause start of script.
(Gives NZBGet time to perform "UnpackCleanupDisk" action on slow systems).

options.name: DeleteLeftover
description: Delete leftover zip files after successful extract.
